      • getIdentityId

        public String getIdentityId()
                     throws Exception
        Retrieve the Cognito identity id. This method calls makes a network call to Amazon Cognito Federated Identities in order to fetch the Identity Id. This method only applies to AWSCredentialsProvider of type CognitoCredentialsProvider.
        Returns:
        identityId
        Throws:
        Exception

      • getIdentityId

        public void getIdentityId(Callback<String> getIdentityCallback)
        Retrieve the Cognito identity id. This method makes the network call to Amazon Cognito Federated Identities in a background thread. This method only applies to AWSCredentialsProvider of type CognitoCredentialsProvider.
        Parameters:
        getIdentityCallback - The callback object whose onResult will be called upon success and onError will be called upon failure while retrieving the identityId.

      • getToken

        public String getToken(Class<? extends SignInProvider> tokenSource)
        Returns the token associated with the SignInProvider used
        Parameters:

        Returns:

      • getCredentialsProvider

        public AWSCredentialsProvider getCredentialsProvider()

      • getCredentials

        public AWSCredentials getCredentials()
                              throws Exception
        Retrieve the AWSCredentials from the AWSCredentialsProvider. This method makes a network call in order to fetch the credentials.
        Returns:
        awsCredentials that wraps the Access, Secret Access and Session key.
        Throws:
        Exception

      • getCredentials

        public void getCredentials(Callback<AWSCredentials> awsCredentialsAuthCallback)
        Retrieve the AWSCredentials from the AWSCredentialsProvider. This method makes a network call from a background thread in order to fetch the credentials.
        Parameters:
        awsCredentialsAuthCallback - The callback object whose onResult will be called with the valid AWSCredentials upon success and onError with exception upon failure.

      • getSignInProvider

        public <T extends SignInProvider> T getSignInProvider(Class<? extends SignInProvider> providerClass)
        Gets the provider based on the class provided. Usage GoogleSignInProvider provider = auth.getSignInProvider(GoogleSignInProvider.class);
        Parameters:
        providerClass -
        Returns:

      • createSignInProvider

        public SignInProvider createSignInProvider(SignInProviderBuilder builder)
        Create a SignInProvider object based on the builder object passed in. Usage: GoogleSignInProvider gsp = auth.createSignInProvider(new GoogleSignInProviderBuilder().activity(myActivity));
        Parameters:
        builder -
        Returns:
        the SignInProvider object
